property.name: app.bind.address
property.description: App Fabric service bind address (deprecated; use ${master.services.bind.address} instead)

property.name: audit.kafka.topic
property.description: Apache Kafka topic name to which audit messages are published

property.name: dataset.service.bind.address
property.description: Dataset service bind address (deprecated; use ${master.services.bind.address} instead)

property.name: explore.executor.container.instances
property.description: Number of explore executor instances (deprecated; instance count is always set to 1)

property.name: explore.executor.max.instances
property.description: Maximum number of explore executor instances (deprecated; instance count is always set to 1)

property.name: kafka.bind.address
property.description: CDAP Kafka service bind port (deprecated; use ${kafka.server.host.name} instead)

property.name: kafka.bind.port
property.description: CDAP Kafka service bind port (deprecated; use ${kafka.server.port} instead)

property.name: kafka.default.replication.factor
property.description: CDAP Kafka service replication factor (deprecated; use ${kafka.server.default.replication.factor} instead)

property.name: kafka.log.dir
property.description: CDAP Kafka service log storage directory (deprecated; use ${kafka.server.log.dirs} instead)

property.name: kafka.log.retention.hours
property.description: The number of hours to keep a log file before deleting it (deprecated; use ${kafka.server.log.retention.hours} instead)

property.name: kafka.num.partitions
property.description: Default number of partitions for a topic (deprecated; use ${kafka.server.num.partitions} instead)

property.name: kafka.zookeeper.connection.timeout.ms
property.description: The maximum time (in milliseconds) that the client will wait to establish a connection to Zookeeper (deprecated; use ${kafka.server.zookeeper.connection.timeout.ms} instead)

property.name: log.cleanup.max.num.files
property.description: Maximum number of files scanned in one iteration

property.name: log.cleanup.run.interval.mins
property.description: Log cleanup interval in minutes

property.name: log.retention.duration.days
property.description: Duration (the time-to-live) in days of saved log files in HDFS retention

property.name: log.saver.checkpoint.interval.ms
property.description: The time between log saver checkpoints in milliseconds (deprecated: use ${log.process.pipeline.checkpoint.interval.ms} instead)

property.name: log.saver.run.memory.megs
property.description: Memory in megabytes allocated for log saver instances to run in YARN (deprecated: use ${log.saver.container.memory.mb} instead)

property.name: log.saver.run.num.cores
property.description: Number of cores for each log saver instance in YARN (deprecated: use ${log.saver.container.num.cores} instead)

property.name: metrics.messaging.fetcher.limit
property.description: Maximum number of metrics messages to be fetched from the messaging fetcher at a time. It is also the maximum number of metric values to be persisted in the metrics store after the number of fetched messages reaches the limit.

property.name: notification.kafka.topic
property.description: Kafka topic name used to publish notifications

property.name: notification.transport.system
property.description: Transport system used by the notification system; can be either 'kafka' or 'stream'

property.name: security.auth.server.address
property.description: CDAP Authentication service bind address (deprecated; use ${security.auth.server.bind.address} instead)

property.name: ssl.enabled
property.description: Determines if SSL is enabled (deprecated; use ${ssl.external.enabled} instead)

property.name: security.auth.server.announce.address
property.description: CDAP Authentication service announce address. This is the address in the URL that clients should use to communicate with the Authentication Server. Leave empty to use the default value generated by the Authentication Server. (deprecated; use ${security.auth.server.announce.urls} instead)
